body_html:
Hey, can you please give a better explanation of this bug? I know it's legitimate because you showed it to me and Chen, but your explanation isn't one the maintainers are going to be able to look at and say "alright, I know what I need to fix." I'll give you extra credit for finding this, remind me during office hours.

I've posted an explanation.
